page.title: 04Education: Area School.
page.content: ADVANTAGES:At an area school we have more friends and teachers and a different type of education.We are able to have a lot of team sports like football, hockey, netball, cricket and rounders. We have a chance to play in matches with other schools. There are enough children to have an orchestra and violin lessons.We are able to have puppet shows,plays and demonstrations by professional groups.We invite nearby small schools to join us for these. We take our Christmas services out to the churches and chapels in the villages. DISADVANTAGES: Classes are sometimes bigger than in smaller schools It can be difficult for parents to come into school because of transport problems We cannot stay after school for extra activities unless we have our own transport.
